title: Realms Plus 现已发布！

txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2019-12-5 01:26 编辑 


Realms Plus is Here
Realms Plus 现已发布！
Your own private server and over fifty pieces of Marketplace content!
个人独享的服务器和超过五十份的商城内容！
Are you familiar with Minecraft Realms? It was our monthly subscription service that let you and up to ten friends play online Minecraft multiplayer together in your own private server! And as of today, it’s GONE FOREVER :(
你熟悉Minecraft Realms吗？这是我们的月度订阅服务，让你可以和10个朋友一起，在你自己的私人服务器上进行在线 Minecraft 多人游戏！但从今天开始，它永远消失了 :(

But the good news is, we’re replacing it with something better,Realms Plus! With this new monthly subscription service, you still get your own private server for you and your friends to enjoy, plus you get over fifty pieces of Minecraft Marketplace content. All for the same price!
但好消息是，我们会用更好的 Realms Plus 取代它！有了这个新的每月订阅服务，你仍然可以拥有自己的私人服务器，供你和你的朋友享用，此外，你还可以获得 超过50份的 Minecraft 商城 内容 。而且价格不变！

So if you’re currently subscribed to Minecraft Realms with a ten-player realm, you’ll be upgraded to Realms Plus for free. If you’re not currently subscribed to Minecraft Realms, you won’t be upgraded to Realms Plus for free. Sorry! Take solace in the fact that you can try your first month of Realms Plus for free.
如果你已经订阅了十人的Minecraft Realms，它会被免费升级到Realms Plus。如果你没有订阅十人的Minecraft Realms，就不会被免费升级到Realms Plus，对不起了！但好的一点是，你可以免费试.用首月的Realms Plus！

Let’s enjoy the launch trailer:
享用 发布宣传片 吧:
[media]https://www.bilibili.com/video/av77984640[/media]

Realms Plus is available for all versions of Minecraft that have the Minecraft Marketplace . Like I promised way back in paragraph two, you’ll get over fifty pieces of Marketplace content at launch, including adventures, skin packs, worlds, mini-games and more! We’ll be adding new content every month and updating you about what’s new in a monthly article right here on minecraft.net. Is reading my appalling jokes worth it to access so much great Marketplace content for only $7.99 a month? Just about.
Realms Plus 适用于 所有具有 Minecraft商城 的Minecraft版本（即 Minecraft基岩版）。就像我在第二段中所承诺的那样，你将在发布时获得超过50种商城内容，包括冒险地图，皮肤包，存档，迷你游戏等等 ！我们将每月添加新的内容，并在minecraft.net上的月更文章中为你更新。以每月仅7.99美元的价格访问如此出色的商城内容值不值？差不多吧。

As for the Realms part, you’ll have your own private server where you can invite as many friends as you like, and play with up to ten of them at a time. You can play locally or in a private, persistent world, safely stored in the cloud. Plus, your friends can access all of the content in your realm for free! 
至于 Realms 部分，你将拥有自己的私人服务器，你可以邀请任意数量的朋友，但最多只能10个朋友同时在线，你可以将本地存档放到这个私人的、持久的、安全的云存储中。另外，你的朋友可以免费访问你领域内的所有内容！

Want to try Realms Plus? Click here .
想试试Realms Plus？点我传送到游戏
